citations.narrative:
Two golden doodles and one poodle over the age of 16 weeks were not properly identified. These dogs did not have
official tags and were not microchipped. These dogs must be identified for inventory control and individual animal
identification. Identify these dogs with USDA tags.
Correct by: 4/12/24
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.50(a)(1) 
   
Time and method of identification. 
Two golden doodles and one poodle over the age of 16 weeks were not properly identified. These dogs did not have 
official tags and were not microchipped. These dogs must be identified for inventory control and individual animal 
identification. Identify these dogs with USDA tags. 
Correct by: 4/12/24 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
